abstract: California state finance director Ana Matosantos is arrested and accused of driving drunk after the police saw her swerving.
snippet: The state finance director, Ana Matosantos, was arrested early Friday and accused of driving drunk after the police saw her swerving near the Capitol.
lead_paragraph: The state finance director, Ana Matosantos, was arrested early Friday and accused of driving drunk after the police saw her swerving near the Capitol.
